name: MORDHAU PE
description:
MORDHAU is a medieval first & third person slasher game. Enter a hectic battlefield of up to more players as a mercenary in a fictional, but realistic world, where you will get to experience the brutal and satisfying melee combat that will have you always coming back for more.

Believable fights: A game where fights look believable, MORDHAU strikes a balance between gameplay and realism.

Fight anywhere: Experience cavalry charges, fight on ladders, and operate siege engines such as the catapult and ballista.
